projects.label: E-commerce website - WIP
projects.description: Current project I'm working on. It's a multi page e-commerce application built with React, Redux (with Reselect for memoization) and Firebase (authentication and Firestore database). So far it contains fully responsive pages: landing page, shop, checkout and the register & login page with an option of google sign in. Plans to add: contact page content and the payment using the Stripe API. Current work: migration to NextJs.

projects.label: Micro-frontends with Module Federation
projects.description: An example of application with a micro-frontends architecture that applies concepts of the Webpack 5 Module Federation. In this application, modules are integrated at runtime via Module Federation Plugin. They contain different tech stacks (React and Vue) and can be developed and deployed individually. However, the project contains an example of deployment workflows (github actions) and is configured to use AWS S3 service for deployment and CloudFront as a CDN (for better performance).

projects.label: Image Generator
projects.description: A simple image generator that creates images based on provided text description using OpenAI API (DALL-E model). The app is written in React and Typescript, and the styles with Sass in a mobile-first approach.

projects.label: React Currency Converter
projects.description: A single page application written with the React in functional programming like approach. It uses the exchanged rates API.

projects.label: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: The project for this website with some examples of my personal/hobby work (more projects can be found on my github account), made with React and TypeScript in functional programming like approach. A mobile-first approach is used for the styles.

projects.label: Halloween gallery
projects.description: Fully responsive single page website with a gallery example. It's made with a pure JavaScript in functional programming like approach, and the styles with a mobile-first approach.

projects.label: Modified 3D Print Toolbox
projects.description: Blender 3d addon with utilities for 3d printing. It's based on existing built-in addon, the '3D Print Toolbox'. This expanded version has more flexibility and influence on the mesh cleanup settings.
